dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: False alarm for anyone thinking spring in Kazakhstan is all sunshine and flowers. Astana's got a real rollercoaster coming up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: False alarm for anyone thinking spring in Kazakhstan is all sunshine and flowers. Astana's got a real rollercoaster coming up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, just look at April 11th. They're forecasting a dust storm in Astana with winds gusting up to 18 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, just look at April eleventh. They're forecasting a dust storm in Astana with winds gusting up to eighteen meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 11, the weather in Astana will remain dry, but there will be a dust storm. Winds will be from the south, gusting up to 18 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's, uh, pretty intense. And the temperature is still gonna be summer-like, like plus 25 degrees Celsius during the day, which is wild combined with all that dust.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, uh, pretty intense. And the temperature is still gonna be summer-like, like plus twenty five degrees Celsius during the day, which is wild combined with all that dust.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At night, temperatures will drop to +13ÂC, with daytime highs reaching +25ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And then it just gets weirder. By the 13th, a sharp cold front hits, and they're calling for rain and another dust storm. The high drops to just plus 15.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then it just gets weirder. By the thirteenth, a sharp cold front hits, and they're calling for rain and another dust storm. The high drops to just plus fifteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 13, a sharp cold front will arrive. Rain is expected along with another dust storm. Winds will shift again, and temperatures will drop to +5ÂC at night, with a maximum of +15ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So you'd need a coat and a dust mask on the same day. Meanwhile, Almaty is just... chilling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you'd need a coat and a dust mask on the same day. Meanwhile, Almaty is just... chilling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In contrast, Almaty will enjoy stable warmth and calm conditions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! They're getting stable warmth, no alarms at all. Sunny and dry, with temps soaring up to 27 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! They're getting stable warmth, no alarms at all. Sunny and dry, with temps soaring up to twenty seven degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 12 and 13, no weather alarms are expected: dry and sunny, with temperatures soaring to +27ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's like two completely different countries. Perfect weather for light shirts and walks in Almaty, while Astana is battling the elements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like two completely different countries. Perfect weather for light shirts and walks in Almaty, while Astana is battling the elements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So, it's a good idea to keep windbreakers and dust masks handy in Astana, while in Almaty, it's perfect weather for light shirts and outdoor walks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you really have to check which city you're in before you step out the door this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you really have to check which city you're in before you step out the door this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Definitely keep that windbreaker handy if you're up north.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Definitely keep that windbreaker handy if you're up north.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So, it's a good idea to keep windbreakers and dust masks handy in Astana, while in Almaty, it's perfect weather for light shirts and outdoor walks.
